text: ane jana kari do ke a kura'ana kharekhara tamara palanahara taraphathi che, have je icche imana lave ane je icche inkara kare, atyacari'o mate ame te aga taiyara kari rakhi che jeni jvala'o temane gheravamam la'i lese, jo te'o phariyada karava icchase to temani phariyada te pani vade karavamam avase je telana chantakava jevi hase, je cahera'one bali nakhase, khuba ja kharaba pani ane atyanta kharaba thekanum (jahannama) che
